title: Inazuma Eleven: Chou Jigen Dream Match
original_name: イナズマイレブン 超次元ドリームマッチ
ending_song: "Seishun oden (青春おでん)" by Aoi Sorano (Sayaka Kitahara) & Midori Seto (Mina) & Akane Yamada (Yurin) & Kinako Nanobana (Aoi Yuuki)
sinopse: A new movie featuring a match between fan-voted members of the Inazuma Best Eleven team and the special Battle Eleven team.
